channel.title: Domain Names on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Names on 0x000216

item.title: With Hosting You Get Domains
item.description: Looking for a website host? Consider this: 1&1 Web Hosting has a promotion running for summer 2009 that could potentially eliminate your hosting fees for three months. As if that weren’t enough, they’re also offering free domain names. Still not satisfied? They offer business hosting at $9.99 per month, developer hosting at $19.99 per month, and even include free software. Curious about the free software? It’s what you’ll need to build and promote your website.

item.title: Website Reseller Hosting For One
item.description: Many believe website reseller hosting is a simple way to start a hosting company with a private, ready-made operation. Web designers who create and maintain numerous small sites for local companies often utilize reseller hosting. However, there’s a third, important use for reseller accounts: highly adaptable hosting for personal use. This approach is particularly beneficial if you own multiple domains. In the internet’s early days, domain names were costly, leading businesses to settle for a single domain.

item.title: Go Daddy CEO Elephant Debacle
item.description: GoDaddy, the tech company known for its Super Bowl commercials and accessible domain registration services, has unexpectedly found itself in hot water. CEO Bob Parsons posted a video of himself killing an elephant on a hunting trip, sparking outrage among animal rights activists and everyday people alike. While hunting is a complex issue, the backlash centers around Parsons’ seeming lack of remorse and the blatant celebration of killing an endangered animal.

item.title: Your Business Website is $7
item.description: Having a business website is essential in today’s digital world. However, the cost of building a website can be a barrier for many businesses. While custom websites can cost thousands of dollars, even basic websites can cost hundreds per year for hosting. But imagine having a professional website and domain for less than $7 annually. This is not a dream. For $6.99 yearly, a major web hosting provider offers domain registration and a five-page website builder.
